ptolemy.homer.gui

Class TabScenePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.homer.gui.TabScenePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentPrototype

    public class TabScenePanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContentPrototype
    The tab scene onto which widgets can be dropped, resized, and arranged in order to suite the needs of the handheld consumer.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
